alert.note: Alert for Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 02 at 4:25PM CDT until April 02 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN GRAYSON COUNTY... At 425 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dorchester, or near Sherman, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sherman, Denison, Howe, Bells, Tom Bean, Knollwood, Dorchester, Randell Lake, Valley Lake, Southmayd, Boddie, Ida, Carpenters Bluff, Ambrose, Luella, White Mound and Farmington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for north central Texas.
